abstracts.cdata!:
The project is designed to achieve the
            following objectives: (i) to relieve the shortage of skilled
            middle-level manpower by establishing four vocational
            training institutes, (ii) to improve the quality of and
            increase the access to primary education by establishing
            four primary teacher training centers, (iii) to implement a
            pilot community development project, and (iv) to prepare a
            follow-up project and to strengthen the Government education
            planning capacity. The community development project's
            being experimental is probably the most risky component; the
            project is, however, limited to two townships in this phase
            and would be closely monitored.
